title: What Do Poets Want?
html:
What Do Poets Want?

Words that fit,

Double-parked

In tight spaces.

Jaunce, for example.

Or Moon-simple.

I'll stick them

in lines 4 & 5

Hope

No one will notice.

â€”Louis Phillips
preview:
